abstract: Egypt contends Muslim Brotherhood members, trained by Hamas, committed 2015 bombing that killed prosecutor Hisham Barakat.

headline.print_headline: Egypt Ties Assassination to Muslim Brotherhood and Hamas
headline.main: Egypt Says Muslim Brotherhood, Backed by Hamas, Killed Top Prosecutor

snippet: The assassination of Hisham Barakat in June prompted Cairo to introduce a sweeping antiterrorism law that expanded government powers and restricted civil liberties.
lead_paragraph: The assassination of Hisham Barakat in June prompted Cairo to introduce a sweeping antiterrorism law that expanded government powers and restricted civil liberties.
